name: Mønkey Madness
description:
Have you ever dreamt of eating as many meatballs as you can when you were in a Swedish furnishing brand store? Well now you can! Play as a monkey that just went on a shopping spree and bought an ungodly amount of meatballs, but due to the amount of people at the store, they lost their meatballs! Help this monkey find and eat as many of their lost meatballs by throwing shopping car at people to get them out of your way while escaping the staff and set the highscore!

Controls

WASD: Moving around

E: Picking up shopping cart

Left Mouse: Throwing shopping cart

Global Game Jam 2021 Project
Credits:

Visual Artist

Elizaveta Makhova 

Programmers

Robin Hardy & Tom Semeijn

Technical & level designers

Leroy Verdoold, Sandrine le Comte & Ariënne van Ee
